title: The Punjab Laws Act, 1872
description: Governs the application and enforcement of laws in the Punjab region.

title: The Dock Workers (Safety, Health and Welfare) Act, 1986
description: Provides regulations for safety, health, and welfare of dock workers.

title: The National Judicial Appointments Commission Act, 2014
description: Establishes framework for judicial appointments and accountability.

title: The Dehra Dun Act, 1871
description: Defines administrative and governance provisions for Dehra Dun.

title: The National Commission for Homoeopathy Act, 2020
description: Establishes the National Commission for regulating education and practice of homoeopathy.

title: The Calcutta Land-Revenue Act, 1856
description: Governs collection and management of land revenue in Calcutta region.

title: The Madras Board of Revenue, 1849
description: Defines the structure and powers of the Madras Board of Revenue.

title: The All-India Institute of Medical Science Act, 1956
description: Establishes AIIMS and governs its administration and functioning.

title: The Anusandhan National Research Foundation Act, 2023
description: Establishes the foundation for promoting and funding research in India.

title: The Bengal Land Holder's Attendance Act, 1848
description: Requires landholders in Bengal to attend official proceedings related to land revenue.

title: The National Dental Commission Act, 2023
description: Establishes the National Dental Commission for regulating dental education and practice.

title: The National Nursing and Midwifery Commission Act, 2023
description: Creates a national commission to regulate nursing and midwifery education and practice.

title: The Indian Institute of Management Act, 2017
description: Governs establishment, administration, and functioning of IIMs in India.

title: The Rent Recovery Act, 1853
description: Regulates the recovery of rents from tenants and lessees.

title: The Bureau of Indian Standards Act, 2016
description: Establishes BIS and defines standards for goods, services, and certification.

title: The Inland Waterways Authority of India Act, 1985
description: Establishes authority to develop and regulate inland waterways for transport.

title: The Betwa River Board Act, 1976
description: Establishes the Betwa River Board for water resource management and regulation.

title: The Dam Safety Act, 2021
description: Regulates the safety, inspection, and maintenance of dams across India.

title: The Warehousing (Development and Regulation) Act, 2007
description: Provides guidelines for development and regulation of warehouses and warehousing systems.

title: The Regional Centre for Biotechnology Act, 2016
description: Establishes a regional centre to promote biotechnology research and education.

title: The Major Port Authorities Act, 2021
description: Governs administration, regulation, and management of major ports in India.

title: The Energy Conservation Act, 2001
description: Promotes energy efficiency and conservation through regulation and incentives.

title: The Real Estate (Regulation and Development) Act, 2016
description: Regulates the real estate sector and protects the interests of buyers.

title: The Agricultural and Processed Food Products Export Development Authority Act, 1985
description: Promotes exports of agricultural and processed food products from India.

title: The General Clauses Act, 1897
description: Provides general definitions, rules, and interpretations for Indian legislation.

title: The Salar Jung Museum Act, 1961
description: Establishes the Salar Jung Museum and governs its administration.

title: The Rampur Raza Library Act, 1975
description: Provides for administration and preservation of Rampur Raza Library collections.

title: The Khuda Bakhsh Oriental Public Library Act, 1969
description: Regulates the administration of Khuda Bakhsh Oriental Public Library and its collections.

title: The Delhi Police Act, 1978
description: Governs the structure, powers, and functions of the Delhi Police.

title: The National Capital Region Planning Board Act, 1985
description: Establishes the board to plan and coordinate development of the National Capital Region.

title: The National Bank for Financing Infrastructure and Development Act, 2021
description: Provides for the establishment and regulation of a bank to finance infrastructure projects.

title: The Press Council Act, 1978
description: Establishes the Press Council to maintain standards of journalism and press freedom.

title: The Orphanages and other Charitable Homes (Supervision and Control) Act, 1960
description: Provides for supervision and control of orphanages and charitable homes.

title: The Asiatic Society Act, 1984
description: Regulates the administration of the Asiatic Society for promotion of literature, arts, and science.

title: The Spices Board Act, 1986
description: Provides for development, regulation, and promotion of the spice industry in India.

title: The Indian Veterinary Council Act, 1984
description: Regulates veterinary education and practice in India and establishes the Indian Veterinary Council.

title: The English and Foreign Languages University Act, 2006
description: Establishes the English and Foreign Languages University and governs its administration.

title: The African Development Fund Act, 1982
description: Provides for India's participation in the African Development Fund and related financial arrangements.

title: The Competition Act, 2002
description: Promotes fair competition in the market, prohibits anti-competitive practices, and establishes the Competition Commission of India.

title: The Punjab District Boards Act, 1883
description: Provides for the establishment and governance of district boards in Punjab for local administration.

title: The City of Bombay Municipal (Supplementary) Act, 1888
description: Amends and supplements the municipal administration framework for the City of Bombay.

title: The Protection of Plant Varieties and Farmers Rights Act, 2001
description: Protects rights of plant breeders and farmers, and promotes development of new plant varieties.

title: The Pondicherry University Act, 1985
description: Establishes Pondicherry University and defines its administrative and academic framework.

title: The Visva-Bharati Act, 1951
description: Establishes Visva-Bharati University at Santiniketan and governs its administration.

title: The Dr. Rajendra Prasad Central Agricultural University Act, 2016
description: Establishes the agricultural university and regulates its academic and administrative affairs.

title: The Chartered Accountants Act, 1949
description: Regulates the profession of Chartered Accountancy in India and establishes the Institute of Chartered Accountants of India.

title: The Delhi and Ajmer-Merwara Land Development Act, 1948
description: Governs land development, acquisition, and use in Delhi and Ajmer-Merwara regions.

title: The Indira Gandhi National Tribal University Act, 2007
description: Establishes the National Tribal University for promoting higher education among tribal communities.

title: The Central Universities Act, 2009
description: Provides a framework for establishment, governance, and coordination of central universities in India.

title: The African Development Bank Act, 1983
description: Provides for India's participation in the African Development Bank and related financial arrangements.

title: The Rajiv Gandhi University Act, 2006
description: Establishes Rajiv Gandhi University and regulates its administration and academic framework.

title: The Tripura University Act, 2006
description: Provides for the establishment and governance of Tripura University.

title: The Sikkim University Act, 2006
description: Establishes Sikkim University and defines its administrative and academic structure.

title: The Indira Gandhi National Open University Act, 1985
description: Establishes IGNOU for distance education and regulates its administration and programs.

title: The Bengal Indigo Contracts Act, 1836
description: Regulates contracts between indigo planters and cultivators in Bengal to protect labor rights.

title: The Mediation Act, 2023
description: Provides a legal framework for mediation as an alternative dispute resolution mechanism.

title: The Tobacco Board Act, 1975
description: Establishes the Tobacco Board to promote tobacco cultivation, marketing, and research.

title: The Cost Accountants Act, 1959
description: Regulates the profession of cost accountancy in India and establishes the Institute of Cost Accountants of India.

title: The Export-Import Bank of India Act, 1981
description: Provides for the establishment and operation of the Export-Import Bank of India for trade financing.

title: The Geneva Conventions Act, 1960
description: Implements the Geneva Conventions for humanitarian treatment during armed conflicts.

title: The Metro Railways (Operation and Maintenance) Act, 2002
description: Regulates operation, maintenance, and safety standards for metro railway systems in India.

title: The Revenue, Bombay, 1842
description: Governs land revenue administration and collection in Bombay Presidency.

title: The Partition of Revenue-Paying Estates Act, 1863
description: Provides for partition and settlement of revenue-paying estates in British India.

title: The Bombay Rent-free Estates Act, 1851
description: Regulates the administration of rent-free estates in Bombay Presidency.

title: The Bengal Embankment Act, 1855
description: Provides for construction and maintenance of embankments for flood control in Bengal.

title: The Industrial Development Bank (Transfer of Undertaking and Repeal) Act, 2003
description: Transfers the assets and liabilities of IDBI to a company and repeals the earlier Act.

title: The Bengal Land Revenue Sales Act, 1859
description: Regulates the sale of land for recovery of revenue in Bengal.

title: The Prevention of Cruelty to Animals Act, 1960
description: Provides for the prevention of cruelty to animals and their welfare.

title: The Delhi Municipal Corporation Act, 1957
description: Regulates the functioning and administration of municipal corporations in Delhi.

title: The Comptroller Auditor-General s (Duties, Powers and Conditions of Service) Act, 1971
description: Defines the duties, powers, and service conditions of the Comptroller and Auditor-General of India.

title: The Oudh Laws Act, 1876
description: Consolidates and amends the laws applicable in the Oudh region.

title: The King of Oudh's Estate Validation Act, 1917
description: Validates the transfer and management of the estates of the former King of Oudh.

title: The Madras District Police Act, 1859
description: Regulates the organization and powers of district police in Madras Presidency.

title: The International Development Association (Status, Immunities and Privileges) Act, 1960
description: Grants legal status and privileges to the International Development Association in India.

title: The Rajiv Gandhi National Aviation University Act, 2013
description: Establishes the National Aviation University to develop skilled professionals in aviation.

title: The Regional Rural Banks Act, 1976
description: Provides for the establishment and regulation of regional rural banks in India.

title: The Oil and Natural Gas Commission (Transfer of Undertaking and Repeal) Act, 1993
description: Transfers the assets and liabilities of ONGC to a company and repeals the earlier Act.

title: The Companies Act, 2013
description: Regulates the incorporation, management, and dissolution of companies in India.

title: The Jammu and Kashmir (Extension of Laws) Act, 1956
description: Extends certain Indian laws to the state of Jammu and Kashmir.

title: The Bombay Civil Courts Act, 1869
description: Provides for the constitution and jurisdiction of civil courts in Bombay.

title: The Public Sector Iron and Steel Companies (Restructuring) and Miscellaneous Provisions Act, 1978
description: Restructures public sector iron and steel companies and lays down related provisions.

title: The Institutes of Technology Act, 1961
description: Provides for the establishment and governance of Indian Institutes of Technology.

title: The National Forensic Sciences University Act, 2020
description: Establishes the National Forensic Sciences University and governs its functioning.

title: The Manipur (Hill Areas) District Councils Act, 1971
description: Provides for the administration of district councils in the hill areas of Manipur.

title: The Sir Dinshaw Manockjee Petit Act, 1893
description: Relates to the endowment and charitable trust established by Sir Dinshaw Manockjee Petit.

title: The Explosives Act, 1884
description: Regulates manufacture, possession, use, sale, transport, and import of explosives.

title: The Provincial Small Cause Courts Act, 1887
description: Provides for the constitution and jurisdiction of small cause courts in provinces.

title: The Chemical Weapons Convention Act, 2000
description: Implements obligations under the Chemical Weapons Convention in India.

title: The Delhi Apartment Ownership Act, 1986
description: Regulates ownership, management, and transfer of apartments in Delhi.

title: The National Institutes of Design Act, 2014
description: Establishes and governs National Institutes of Design as institutions of national importance.

title: The Andhra Pradesh Reorganisation Act, 2014
description: Provides for the creation of the state of Telangana and reorganization of Andhra Pradesh.

title: The Income-tax Act, 1961
description: Governs the levy, administration, collection, and recovery of income tax in India.

title: The Rights of Persons with Disabilities Act, 2016.
description: Provides for protection of rights and equal opportunities for persons with disabilities.

title: The Recovery Of Debts And Bankruptcy Act, 1993
description: Establishes tribunals for recovery of debts by banks and financial institutions.

title: The Apprentices Act, 1961
description: Regulates training of apprentices in industries and establishments.

title: The Indian Institutes of Information Technology (Public-private Partnership) Act, 2017
description: Establishes IIITs under PPP mode and declares them institutions of national importance.

title: The Air (Prevention and Control of Pollution) Act, 1981
description: Provides for prevention, control, and abatement of air pollution in India.

title: The North-Eastern Areas (Reorganisation) Act, 1971
description: Reorganizes the north-eastern states and creates new states and union territories.

title: The Delhi Sales Tax Act, 1975
description: Regulates levy and collection of sales tax in Delhi.

title: The Jammu and Kashmir Reorganisation Act, 2019
description: Reorganizes Jammu & Kashmir into two union territories: Jammu & Kashmir and Ladakh.

title: The Central Provinces Land-Revenue Act, 1881
description: Deals with the assessment and collection of land revenue in the Central Provinces.

title: The delhi rent control act, 1958
description: Regulates the renting of premises and protection of tenants in Delhi.

title: The Central Excise Act, 1944
description: Provides for levy and collection of excise duties on goods manufactured in India.

title: The Indian Forest Act, 1927
description: Provides for the protection, conservation, and management of forests in India.

title: The Prevention of Money-Laundering Act, 2002
description: Prevents money laundering and provides for confiscation of property involved in laundering.

title: The Inland Vessels Act, 2021
description: Regulates the construction, equipment, operation, and navigation of inland vessels in India.

title: The Customs Tariff Act, 1975
description: Provides for levy of customs duties on import and export of goods.
